dropArea.text: Drop images here or click to upload

alerts.maxImages: Can only process up to {max} images. Currently have {current}.
alerts.fileTooLarge:
File "{filename}" is too large ({size}).
Maximum file size is {maxSize}.
alerts.storageQuotaExceeded: Storage is full, some image information will not be saved. You'll need to re-upload images after refreshing the page.
alerts.refreshWarning: You'll need to re-upload images after refreshing.
alerts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all images?
alerts.deleteCategoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{category}" and all its images?
